title: The Sims 3 Final Collection 2013
description:
THE SIMS 3 COLLECTION

Tutorial to install " Store Items sites "

A. For " Sims3pack " Files - Put the files to the GMT directory : Documents  Electronic Arts  The Sims 3  Downloads
B. For "Package " Files - Put the files to the fallowing directory : Documents  Electronic Arts  The Sims 3  Library - This package file contains the building only. For the items you Will Need to install EITHER the Collective package the package file or files from the building was released this month . List the files in the base folder Will Be Able to help you determine That Which Is.
C. For "World " Files - Put the files to the fallowing directory : Documents  Electronic Arts  The Sims 3  InstalledWorlds - The world files CONTAIN the neighborhoods only. For the items you Will Need to install EITHER the Collective package the package file or files from the neighborhood was released this month . List the files in the base folder Will Be Able to help you determine That Which Is.
D. For "Store Collection" Files - Put the files to the fallowing directory : Documents  Electronic Arts  The Sims 3  Collections  User


Torrent contains the following:

1. Playing the "Base Game" , The Sims 3 ( Version RaZoR ) .
2 . All expansion packs occurred - from 2009 until the end of 2013.
3 . All Stuff Packs occurred - from 2009 until the end of 2013.
4 . Game cumulative updates , and updates the game's final necessary waging entire collection "The Sims 3" to the latest version (including Addon-uri/Stuff Packs ) .
5 . Crack toys need the latest version of the game The Sims 3 ( Crack is compatible with all other Addon-uri/Stuff Packs if taken correctly tutorial made by me ) .
6 . Keygen entire collection sites for installation Sims 3 .
7 . Tools 's " Create a World & Create a Pattern" - later versions.
8 . Tools 's " Create a World & Create a Pattern" - later versions.
9 . Walkthrough & Cheats .

NOTE: The game does not mention that the images contain "Crack 's" and / or Keygen sites , they are removed from the image . They are found in folders " keygens " and "Crack " .

7. Install The Sims 3 Outdoor Living Stuff using the Keygen then it is updated to: 7.3.2 Cummulative Patch.
8 . Install The Sims 3 Generations Keygen using the . (No Patch Needed for this one ) .
9 . Install The Sims 3 Stuff Townlife using the Keygen . (This Will update the Base Game to version 1.23.65 ) .
10 . Install The Sims 3 Pets using the Keygen . (This Will update the Base Game to version 1.26.89 ) .
